comment: * Command responsible for acting upon scroll state changes.

methods.name: public void doScrollStateChange(AbsListView view, int scrollState)
methods.comment:
* Sets up the runnable with a short delay in case the scroll state
         * immediately changes again.
         *
         * @param view The list view that changed state
         * @param scrollState The new state it changed to

methodNames: public void doScrollStateChange(AbsListView view, int scrollState)
